short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A free tab switcher that switches between tabs and refreshes pages (optional) at set intervals. Perfect for displaying dashboards.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Free Tab Switcher: Automate Your Tab Browsing Experience!

Effortlessly cycle through your open tabs with Free Tab Switcher, the perfect Chrome extension for multitaskers, researchers, and professionals who need to monitor multiple web pages simultaneously.

Key Features:

Automatic Tab Cycling: Set custom intervals to switch between open tabs without manual intervention.
Flexible Refresh Options: Choose to refresh pages on a time interval or before/after tab switches to keep content up-to-date.
User-Friendly Interface: Easily adjust settings with a clean, intuitive popup menu.
Keyboard Shortcut: Quickly toggle the extension on/off with a simple Alt+S keystroke.
Window-Specific Settings: Customize cycling behavior for each browser window independently.
Visual Status Indicator: Clearly see when the extension is active or inactive with color-coded status updates.

Ideal for:

Monitoring multiple dashboards or data feeds
Cycling through news websites or social media feeds
Displaying information on kiosks or public screens
Researchers comparing multiple sources of information
Professionals who need to keep an eye on various web-based tools

Free Tab Switcher streamlines your browsing experience by eliminating the need to manually switch between tabs, perfect for monitoring metrics, checking graphs, digital signage, or any other information that needs constant review.

Customize your tab-switching intervals, set up refresh schedules, and let Free Tab Switcher handle the rest. With its lightweight design and powerful functionality, it's the perfect tool for enhancing your productivity and simplifying your web browsing routine.

Download Free Tab Switcher now and transform the way you interact with multiple web pages!
